page.title: 13 Westmoor Cubs and Brownies
page.content: I go to the 1st Westmoor Cub pack on Tuesday evening.We meet in the Middle School Annexe.We start with Grand Howl, then we give in our subs and we have Inspection. Akela, our leader, looks at our uniforms and he gives points for cleanliness and tidiness. Then we play games. One of my favourites is called Kim. Akela collects everybody's shoes, then he turns the lights out.He muddles all the shoes up, then shouts, "Go," and everyone has to find their own shoes in the dark. Next we do badges. I like the cubs. It gives you something to do. We play football, go to camp and have trips out. Craig Johnson When I go to Brownies, there are a lot of people there. The groups are called Kelpies, Elves, Imps and Sprites. We collect our subs, then we play games like "Traffic Lights". Everyone walks
